title: Removes ten day advance voter registration requirement
summary: Amends the constitution to delete the requirement that registration for purposes of voting be completed at least ten days before election day and provides that laws be made to adequately safeguard against deception in the exercise of the right of suffrage; enables the legislature to enact legislation permitting persons to register to vote on election day and also to implement adequate safeguards against fraud.
actClause: Concurrent Resolution of the Senate and Assembly proposing an amendment to section 5 of article 2 of the constitution, in relation to the ten day advance registration requirement
